org.springframework.cloud.launcher.dataflow

Class DataFlowApplication.H2ServerConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.cloud.launcher.dataflow.DataFlowApplication.H2ServerConfiguration
  • Enclosing class:
    DataFlowApplication

    @Configuration
 @ConditionalOnExpression(value="#{\'${spring.datasource.url:}\'.startsWith(\'jdbc:h2:tcp://localhost:\') && !\'${spring.datasource.url:}\'.contains(\'/mem:\')}")
public static class DataFlowApplication.H2ServerConfiguration
extends Object
